I want to activate office 2013 I have OS windows 7 ultimate. How I can do it THANKS

First, thank you for the upload. Second:

I'm sorry, but these are the most convoluted instructions I've ever had to follow. There has to be away to make this instructions A LOT clearer. Needless to say, I tried to follow but couldn't get it to work.... not exactly sure what step 1 begins and/or ends.

To Avtivate Office 2013:
Run CMD As ADMIN!

cd /D "%ProgramFiles%Microsoft OfficeOffice15"
cscript OSPP.VBS /inpkey:YC7DK-G2NP3-2QQC3-J6H88-GVGXT
cscript ospp.vbs /sethst:(KMS SERVER IP)
cscript ospp.vbs /act

OR

(SAVE THIS AS .CMD FILE AND RUN)

@echo off 
 setLocal EnableDelayedExpansion 
 chcp 866 

 if "%kms_host%" == "" set kms_host=127.0.0.1
 if "%kms_port%" == "" set kms_port=1688   

 echo Used KMS %kms_host%:%kms_port%   

  setLocal EnableDelayedExpansion  
  set /a X=10  
  set /a N=0  

 :loop  
  if "%X%" == "%N%" goto eoff  
  set /a N+=1  

 cd /D "%ProgramFiles%Microsoft OfficeOffice15"
 net start sppsvc /y 
 cscript ospp.vbs /sethst:KMS
 cscript OSPP.VBS /rearm
 cscript OSPP.VBS /unpkey:GVGXT
 net stop sppsvc /y 
 attrib -H C:WindowsSystem32sppstoredata.dat 
 del C:WindowsSystem32sppstoredata.dat /q 
 net start sppsvc /y 
 cscript OSPP.VBS /inpkey:YC7DK-G2NP3-2QQC3-J6H88-GVGXT
 cscript ospp.vbs /act
 net stop sppsvc /y 
 net start sppsvc /y 
 cd /D "%systemroot%system32" 

timeout 2 
goto loop   

:eoff
